title: The Drop Women's Frida Relaxed Fit Jeans
description: Elevate your basics with this new wardrobe staple. Easy to dress up or down, day to night.
Models are 5'10"/178 cm and wearing a size 27 and 34.
These jeans have a 31.5"/ 80 cm inseam in size 27 and 34.
Loose-Fit: designed for comfort. Midweight cotton and elastane blend denim.
5-pocket styling with a wide leg, seam detailing at front and a button closure with a zip fly.

The Drop is your inside source for must-have style inspiration from global influencers. Shop limited-edition collections and discover chic wardrobe essentials from Staples by the Drop. Look out for trend inspiration, exclusive brand collaborations, and expert styling tips from those in the know.
